one of the best dlc it adds 3 more places to explore and each of them have a few tombs moreover there are more item from each place to decorate your house and even more ways to earn money you can be an adventurer and explore the tomb selling all the things you get from it or becoming a brewer selling nectar  last but not least no more taking time for bath since you can get a bath with just a spray

so ive played around with a lot of the dlc for this game and to be honest most of it seems like it ought to be in the base game i like some of the others but this is by far my favourite world adventures is just plain fun i really enjoy it  sims 3 stuff goes on sale often enough though so obviously you should wait rather than buying at the fairly unreasonable full prices

one of the best dlc for sims 3 the thing about this dlc that is better than the rest is that if you redeem the serial code on the offical sims 3 website you can get free 10 dollars worth simpoints1000simpoints this dlc also offers you 3 subworlds that contains tombs and puzzles that yield tons of loot for your sims ingame

as with all sims dlc wait for it to go on sale its never worth full price that being said i really liked this one you get to travel with your sim to either china france or egypt and can go on adventures there there are little puzzles on each adventure you go on and you discover cool items also some of the new clothes are really cool oh and you can learn martial arts
